body_html:
You can use tf.summary to write the data you want to visualize to the log directory.
Also, this question is better asked on StackOverflow since it is not a bug or feature request. There is also a larger community that reads questions there.

If you think we've misinterpreted a bug, please comment again with a clear explanation, as well as all of the information requested in the issue template. Thanks!

body:
You can use tf.summary to write the data you want to visualize to the log directory.
Also, this question is better asked on [StackOverflow](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/tensorflow) since it is not a bug or feature request. There is also a larger community that reads questions there.

If you think we've misinterpreted a bug, please comment again with a clear explanation, as well as all of the information requested in the [issue template](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/new). Thanks!
